name: Super Crunk Brothers 3: Arena
description:
CRUNK BROTHER VIDEO GAME NOW FOR YOU NINTENDO! PLAY THE GAME! ENJOY & HAVE EUN!

Crunk, a hash brown, and his brother Paco, a human face, have decided to go neck-and-neck by jumping on each other, squashing them in the process. This leads to some crazy multiplayer action as player 1 and player 2 have to work to try and squash each other before the short time limit of 30 seconds rolls around. The map is small - players can loop around the edges like in the original Mario Bros. game.

Player 1 uses WASD and player 2 uses the arrow keys.

This game is a parody of bootleg Famicom and NES games.

This game was written by (HF) Miles for the DUPLICADE game jam http://itch.io/jam/duplicade

http://fantasticfest.com/arcade
